forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 2 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 51. West southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
In the early hours of the morning, Downtown San Francisco is enveloped in a tranquil stillness, with a gentle warmth lingering in the air. The forecast promises a day of mostly sunny skies, with temperatures hovering around a pleasant 68 degrees. As the morning unfolds, there is a comforting prediction of a slight dip to approximately 66 in the afternoon, accompanied by a light southwest breeze that dances through the streets.

Out west, patches of fog cling to the coast, reminiscent of whispers from the Pacific, slowly retreating as the sun begins its ascent. Yet, this morning offers a refreshing clarity, hinting at a day which will brighten with vibrant hues and social possibilities. It invites those who wish to stroll along the waterfront or enjoy a leisurely coffee at a local café, perhaps exchanging smiles with fellow early risers as the city awakens from its slumber. Dress comfortably, layering a light sweater for the cooler shade beneath the buildings, and a t-shirt for when the sunlight peeks through. Given the delightful weather, one might consider a gentle walk along the Embarcadero or a visit to a surprising little bookshop tucked down a tree-lined street—a perfect way to savor this charming San Francisco day.
